name: Magic Broom
subtitle: Bucket Brigade
author: Dav Augereau / Giulia Riva

additional_info.title: FAQ - Costs
additional_info.body:
Q: If I have 2 copies of Mickey Mouse – Wayward Sorcerer in play, will my Magic Broom – Bucket Brigade cost 1 {I} less or 2 {I} less?

A: Your Magic Broom will cost 2 {I} less, 1 {I} for each copy of Mickey Mouse – Wayward Sorcerer.

flavor_text: In the immense story-forge known as the Great Illuminary, there is always work to be done.
rules_text: SWEEP When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.
